solution_line_template: Olaf scored three times more points than his dad, which means he scored {dad_score} * {olaf_times_more} = <<{olaf_times_more}*{dad_score}={olaf_score}>>{olaf_score} points.
So in total, Olaf and his dad scored {olaf_score} + {dad_score} = <<{olaf_score}+{dad_score}={total_score}>>{total_score} points.
